infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location for time tracking purposes.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to your location for time tracking purposes.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location for time tracking purposes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photos to save QR codes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photos to save QR codes.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location for time tracking.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location for time tracking.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location for time tracking.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos to save QR codes.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to save QR codes to your photo library.
